entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 2:30 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
